#### Salaries Dataset

```{r}

salaries = read_excel(
  "data/MLB-Salaries 2000-24.xlsx", 
  sheet = "2022.xls",
  skip = 1) |>
  select(1:4) |>
  rename(position = "Pos'n",
         salary_2022 = "2022.0",
         service_time_yrs = "MLS",
         player = "Player")

salaries

```
